document.full_text: cia director leon panetta on monday said al qaeda would "almost certainly" try to avenge the u.s. killing of osama bin laden.
document.title: cia: al qaeda will "almost certainly" try to avenge bin laden
lines_and_colors: cia director leon panetta on monday said al qaeda would "almost certainly" try to avenge the u.s. killing of osama bin laden.
